name: Zombie Extraction
description:
Try to survive the waves of zombies as long as possible in this top-down zombie shooter !

The controls :

W/A/S/D or Z/Q/S/D : Basic movement

Space bar : Jump

Mouse Cursor : Orient the player

Right Click : Shoot

Esc : Pause the game

It's my first game ever created (and published). I tried to realize a top-down zombie shooter with a kind of low poly graphic style. To make the game more difficult, after reaching the wave 10, zombies healthh will increase after each waves. And their damage will increase after the wave 20.
